metadata.title: Lollisy Boys Wool Socks Kids Winter Warm Socks Thicken Thermal Crew Socks for Boys 6 Pack
features: NOTICE: Minor pilling of wool is possible but not quality problem; Please refer to your shoes size firstly and our age range is just for your reference. If you are not sure, just buy one size up !

►OPTIMAL BOYS WOOL SOCKS◄Made of high quality polyester, wool and spandex, our boys wool crew socks are designed to storage heat for lasting warmth with medium-thick, which would keep your little feet warm and toasty in cold weather.

►BREATHABLE BOYS WARM SOCKS◄Thanks to high quality wool blended fibers, our boys winter wool socks get the properties of wicking moisture away and keeping warm at the same time. They are non-toxic & odor-free, which means no more irritation or stinky feet for your active kids.

►EXCELLENT BOYS WINTER SOCKS◄Reinforced heel and toe with smooth seams makes them excellent warm wool socks for boys. Smooth hand linking with rib knitting provides enough stretch and durability for an easy wear and no more squeezed legs or restrained ankles.

►VALUEABLE BOYS SOCKS PACK◄Easy match & care, our valuable boys winter warm socks pack can eliminate needs for sorting or pairing up. It can be a perfect gift for Christmas, thanksgiving day or birthday.,etc. Suitable for a season stock up.

►QUALITY GUARANTEED SOCKS◄All our pursue is to make your kids satisfied and comfortable with our boys wool socks. No question asked returns or refunds with our Money Back Guarantee. Feel free to reach to us whenever there is any problem.
description: ENJOY THE COZY FIT OF COMFY BOYS WOOL SOCKS

►HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS◄-Strictly inspected blended wool fabrics with high density knitting crafts for exquisite pairs of boys socks that your kids need. Keep kids feet fresh dry and odor & irritation away all day long. ►FEATURED PERFORMANCE◄-Top quality fabric maintains breathable and comfy skin touch features, which thanks to its air-permeability and moisture wicking performance, sweep away unhappiness in daily dress. ►VALUED COLORFUL SOCKS◄-Our boys winter warm wool socks are precisely sewed with colorful yarns for cute cartoon figures, which makes socks wearing an interesting part of your kids daily dressing. Easy match with most shoes and outfits. ►PROTECTION & COZY FEEL◄-Mid calf boys wool socks are most preferred by kids, protect your kids’ ankles and calves well in winter. Smooth hand linking and rib knitting makes it feel as comfy as seamless socks. ►GREAT WEAR & EASY CARE◄-Shrinkage resistant cuff and heel offers nice wearing experience with no squeezed legs or restrained ankles. Hand wash on cold and tumble dry on low, hold up well through repeated washes. ►FEEL THE FIT EVERYWHERE◄-Lasting warmth and lovely colors are suitable for various occasions: daily wear, home, school, outdoor and other activities. Also, they are great for birthday Christmas gifting.
Boys winter wool socks × mix 6 pairs
